website_summaries.verdict: Botanical ingredients help cover up fine lines while minimizing discolorations.
pros: This cream goes on neutral before absorbing and adjusting to your skin tone for a seamless and natural-looking cover up
Moisturizers and zinc oxide with SPF 30 helps with anti-aging
cons: Some found it too light for providing the required coverage

customer_reviews.title: Ingredient List Change!
customer_reviews.text: The product is real, however, the brand changed their ingredients. The actives are no longer mineral! They added Octinoxate along with some other non mineral actives. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: The cream smells like a makeup powder which is totally different from real ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Dr. Jart+ Black Label BB balm for a few years now and this is not the same product as I know. This product same came without a box. It was acceptable but as I used it on my face I knew something was wrong with it. The cream smells like a makeup powder which is totally different from real Dr. Jart+ product. I assume they made it from another factory and sell it fake case. I am highly disappointed at this and recommend buying it from somewhere else. I bought this from Snow Princess SHOP. So, this is a warning for you guys if you have to buy this through online.
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: FAKE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: The Dr. Jart BB Cream I received is NOT the original product. This is a FAKE, phony replica that doesn't even come close. I will be reporting to Amazon. VERY UNHAPPY.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Woodcock

customer_reviews.title: Dr Jart beauty balm, detox container (pump)
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Use for makeup. My only complaint is that the pump does not always work. I have ordered approx. ten tubes and some are ok and some do not work. Have ordered long q-tips to remove makeup. My 2 daughters, one granddaughter and a friend uses it. We all have experienced this problem. My granddaughter took a hammer to one of hers and said there was a white tube inside; then she could use all of it. Because we all love the product, we will continue to buy, but a better pump would be nice! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit product
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive an authentic product. Slightly different packaging, odor, and consistency.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for several years after it was recommended by a sales associate at a major cosmetic store. It is light on the skin but has great coverage. I have people tell em all the time how great my skin looks and that it looks like I don't have makeup on! Good Lord knows I do...... It would be bad if I left home bare faced. Lol for being 41 years young my skin just isn't the same fresh face it used to be. This will be my go-to until I can't buy it anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine1997

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because foundation just does not seem to sit right on my skin. It always makes my pores and wrinkles look even more defined. Not the case with this. It glides on like a moisturizer, a little goes a long way, but- if you accidentally pump too much out just slap that on too, it's tough to over do it with this product. It just never looks thick or caked. Very natural looking, and my bronzer and blush sit well on top of it and set better. If you're looking for a very natural look, you found it.
customer_reviews.author: Merrewyn

customer_reviews.title: Great BB Cream
customer_reviews.text: I want to recommend this great product to family and friends, but there is only one shade. ***UPDATE*** after using this twice, this product is nothing like the original. They had to have changed their formula because the shade, consistency, and smell is all different than the 3 bottles I bought prior to this at Sephora. I recommend buying this in a Sephora, not online.
customer_reviews.author: L. Melchert

customer_reviews.title: Great for mature skin
customer_reviews.text: I have loved this for years! It is great for mature skin when you want just a light moisturizing evenness. Applied with a moist blending sponge it gives me the best possible coverage without making my wrinkles worse.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: All around excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about the detoxifying piece, but this is a great product and I'm sticking with it from now on. Lightweight but excellent coverage. My skin responds well to this product and I have peace of mind that the sunscreen is built in! I use this as my foundation with powder on top and no primer is needed, for sure.
customer_reviews.author: DIzum12

customer_reviews.title: Have only used for a couple days. The finish ...
customer_reviews.text: Have only used for a couple days. The finish is white and chalky, I am trying to get used to it. It does correct some redness issues I have. I give it a 4 star for the fact that I have acne prone skin and have not had any blemishes these past couple days. (I tried another BB product in the past week that caused blemishes.) I will keep using the Jart+ Detox BB and update this review. Note: I have dry skin and some flakiness that is hard to slough off thoroughly. This product really highlights those dry/dead skin bits.
customer_reviews.author: SB in VA

customer_reviews.title: Beware: Formula Change!
customer_reviews.text: They drastically changed the formula on this and now it includes several irritating ingredients. I got a nasty breakout. It was my holy grail, so this is very upsetting! Why mess with perfection?
customer_reviews.author: Anathema Maranatha

customer_reviews.title: It has great coverage and has helped with the oiliness of my ...
customer_reviews.text: I started using this about 4 months ago and purchased my second through Amazon. I did some research before I bought it and so far it has lived up to expectations. It has great coverage and has helped with the oiliness of my skin. With dryer areas, the coverage can look a little odd.. but that is normal with most BB creams. Making sure I use a moisturizer before is helpful... and I still need look oily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: Sad. I wish this had set better. It actually looks good for the first hour, however afterwards is doesn't. The crapy part is that after, when you try to fix it, it comes off pretty easy. I've also noticed that I keep getting small break out's on the high part of my cheek. I don't wear makeup every day, maybe 2 or 3 times a week. I have very sensitive acne prone stubborn and oily/dry. I find that steaming my face helps to minimize my acne.
customer_reviews.author: Drea

customer_reviews.title: Great Coverup
customer_reviews.text: I, unfortunately, have psoriasis that occasionally blossoms onto my face or neck. This Beauty Balm covers it up while I am treating it with medication. Great product. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl L. Lizarraga

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cover
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage, evens out your skin tone if there are any dark spots, is thick and creamy, so a little goes a long way. Love it, wish there was a tad bit of a darker shade.
customer_reviews.author: SHE

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This is still the only BB cream or foundation that doesn't make my skin break out. In fact, I really think it does calm my skin down and protect from irritants while giving a beautiful glowing coverage. Throughout the day, it actually looks better rather than caking or drying out. It's amazing. Just please, please could they make more color variety.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra James

customer_reviews.title: Must Have - Amazing BB Cream
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Dr. Jart+ Black Label Detox BB for over 3 years now and I love this product! I have combination acne-prone skin. This BB cream is my day-to-day go-to in conjunction with concealer and powder. Unlike most foundations and even other BB creams that I have used, this BB cream doesn't make my acne worse and it actually works as an anti-inflammatory on my face with soothing properties. I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a quality go-to BB cream.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ash

customer_reviews.title: Helps prevent breakouts
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for over 5 years. I have sensitive and easily irritated skin that will break out from most skin care products. The medication helps not only prevent breakouts (thats right, I have fewer when I use it ) but also helps with my rosacea.
customer_reviews.author: Martha c

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for people of color or anybody who is not ...
customer_reviews.text: Gives my skin a hydrated, mid-coverage even finish, without being heavy or cakey. Apply almost daily as my makeup routine is very simple. Will sometimes apply a fuller coverage concealer below (MAC studio fix) of a blemish and then apply this BB on top to cover completely. WARNING: Not recommended for people of color or anybody who is not very white. This would not be a good buy if I was not pale.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha McKinley-Yunker

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as day tint in yellow packaging.
customer_reviews.text: I had the old version in the yellow ad white tube. I loved it. However in this new version it is not the same! The color is off on this new version and it’s consistency is thicker. It didn’t have the dewy glow like the first version. It was heavier coverage and looked cakey. I am so bummed that it isn’t the same.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Not spf 25 as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Not as pictured!! I received spf 30 B.B. crene! It’s not the same!!!They changed the product from spf 25 to spf 30 and now it does not cover my skin as well! I wear this as make up! Happy to have more spf but not to have the quality of the product diminished!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Dr Jart my Daughter loves you
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this product!!! It evens out her skin tone . She has less breakouts when she uses it . She’s been using this for 3 yrs She hopes Dr Jart keeps making it .it really works for her
customer_reviews.author: D Collins

customer_reviews.title: I love this product and what it does for my skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and what it does for my skin. I had a sample from Sephora before I purchased this about 2 weeks ago. My skin is definitely reacting to it nicely. The tube, will be annoying when the product is towards the end, I can definitely see why others would gripe about that. Hopefully they will figure a way to package it better to get the last bit of this liquid gold out!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Universal Shade that Soothes my Skin & Reduces Redness
customer_reviews.text: Here's a hint for the people that thing the shade is too light for them: use it as your primer and let the light shade be your highlight then add color for contour and a sun-kissed bronzer/blush on top after setting. Even on days that I don't want to wear make-up or have anywhere to go, I find myself putting this on due to it's skin calming and soothing properties.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Sproch

customer_reviews.title: People with sensitive skin beware
customer_reviews.text: I don't typically write reviews, especially negative ones...but I have to say, I really do not like this product. I do have sensitive skin but am typically ok with most make up and moisturizers, but this one - not so much. My face felt itchy all day and I couldn't wait to get home to remove it. The coverage was nothing special either. I won't use this again.
customer_reviews.author: SelinaLou

customer_reviews.title: I love that it is self-correcting
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a few years now. I love that it is self-correcting. It matches itself to my skin tone. If it is winter and I'm pale, it matches. If it's summer and I'm more tan, it matches. The same tube. I never have to worry if my makeup matches my skin.
customer_reviews.author: MJPete

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with pump broken
customer_reviews.text: I have heard and read nothing but good things about this product but it doesn't work for me. It's much too thick and it makes me feel like I'm wearing lots of makeup. Also, the product arrived with a broken pump and since it's so thick, it was hard to get the cream even after I took off the lid.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't look too thick and I like that it has benefits that other foundation doesn't have
customer_reviews.text: I don't wear a foundation in the summer, just Bare Minerals powder. However, I think my complexion looks washed out in the winter. I wear this lightly under my powder in the winter to make my make-up look more "on". I have to blot my skin often from the oily look, but that could just be my skin. It doesn't look too thick and I like that it has benefits that other foundation doesn't have.
customer_reviews.author: chogge

customer_reviews.title: Great medium coverage for fair-skinned faces
customer_reviews.text: I am fair skinned, with yellow tones, and found this BB Balm matched my skin very well. I also have mild acne and sunspot discoloration. The coverage of this balm is perfect for my issues. I also have oily skin, but the cream keeps it at bay. Applying a translucent powder to set the cream is always helpful for that as well. I use a blending sponge to apply, and find that to be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: NorthStarSeeker

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for over 4 years. I have large pores, so I slap it on and it provides enter coverage.
customer_reviews.author: kutkut

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight. It feels like next to nothing on my face compared to regular foundation. It has great coverage and helps to keep my face from breaking out.
customer_reviews.author: SWilliams

customer_reviews.title: Best BB Cream hands down!
customer_reviews.text: This works so well with my skin. It blends in perfectly and my skin does not look "made up". It wears well all day AND it's good for your skin unlike makeup. You cannot go wrong with this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive, dry skin
customer_reviews.text: This product irritated my sensitive skin so much that I would have to wash it off. I love Dr. Jart products, but this one is not for those with sensitive, dry skin. I would encourage you to use the other BB cream.
customer_reviews.author: Winebrat

customer_reviews.title: Just right!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Does not leave my face feeling oily or dry. It’s just right!
customer_reviews.author: sunnygrl96

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing! Hides those little flaws so nicely
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! Hides those little flaws so nicely. Easy to apply. I will never use another concealer ever again. Just ordered the darker tone for my summer face.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Bates

customer_reviews.title: Use only a small amount
customer_reviews.text: It goes on a bit thick ,so you have to use less than you would w a regular foundation. Once you get the amount right the coverage is great. My skin is becoming more even toned due to the spf ,overall i like the product and will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Something is wrong with this product.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have breakout even when I was a teenager. This product causes breakouts on my face. The consistency is off, a little different from what I purchased at the store before.
customer_reviews.author: eo

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the BEST
customer_reviews.text: Where has this stuff been my whole life??? OMG, this is the holy grail of foundations - at least for me. Perfect color blending, skin treatment and coverage all in one. Absolutely the BEST product ever. And this coming from a make-up junkie. I will never be without this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cherelyn Lutz

customer_reviews.title: Favorite BB cream
customer_reviews.text: Works wonders for all seasons as the color adjusts on your face. Plus you can always add bronzer to some places on your face if you have a tan. I usually purchase the lightest foundation colors so I don't think this would work if you don't have fair skin.
customer_reviews.author: Indialpc

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt blend well with all skin tones..
customer_reviews.text: Dont know why there's just one tone option here..didnt blend well with olive skin..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect color for me in winter. I’ve been using it for several years and I love it
customer_reviews.author: Anne M.

customer_reviews.title: Hands down my favorite BB Cream
customer_reviews.text: Hands down my favorite BB Cream! The coverage is nice and it covers my blemishes well without feeling heavy or overdone. Love Dr. Jart+
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Fox

customer_reviews.title: Oily Skin Beware
customer_reviews.text: This is a great B.B. cream but not the best option for oily skin. It will definitely move everywhere even with a primer. Also, transfers easily even with powder.
customer_reviews.author: TechnoMoe

customer_reviews.title: This is the BEST BB balm of all from Dr
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST BB balm of all from Dr. Jart's and I dare say better than a lot of extremely expensive lines.
customer_reviews.author: GMcG

customer_reviews.title: Definitely try it!
customer_reviews.text: My skin has been very clear since using this BB. Have re-purchased several times and love that it is not oily or too thick. Easily applies with a beauty blender.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Dahl

customer_reviews.title: Best foundation/bb cream ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best foundation/bb cream ever used. Covers like a foundation when needed or light. Adjusts to my skin tone unless I'm really tan. Love it so much
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: High-quality, long lasting concealer
customer_reviews.text: BB is a nice high-quality, long lasting concealer. The color also blends really well, even on pale skin.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Love this BB balm
customer_reviews.text: Love this BB balm. Covers any redness or imperfections. Better than anything I've ever tried. Have received compliments on my "flawless" skin since using it. Don't want to be without it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Mauchin

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to BB cream. Love this stuff! Buildable coverage. Evens out my skin tone. Can be worn alone or under mineral makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Parkecy

customer_reviews.title: The best BB cream
customer_reviews.text: I love this balm, it evens skin tone and makes smooth base for powder finish. Its moisturizing and blends perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love the make up meets skincare aspect. Heavier than tinted moisturizer but doesn't clog pores. Results back up product's claim. Not the first time I've purchased and definitely won't be my last!
customer_reviews.author: B Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Dr. Jart Customer for Life
customer_reviews.text: I have fallen in love with Dr. Jart BB Cream. I started breaking out when I first started using BB Creams, but didn't link the two. This BB Cream is perfect for sensitive skin and those with the dreaded 30's skin. I've started developing wrinkles and acne at the same time and this product is perfect. If helps fight signs of aging as well as breakouts which providing a light coverage. I felt crazy spending $40 on a BB Cream, but I've been sold and will never buy another brand. Light, easy to apply, versatile color, and perfect coverage for that flawless look.
customer_reviews.author: LD Crowe

customer_reviews.title: Glowing Beauty Cream
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to replace my current bottle. It only takes one push of the nozzle and lasts me a few months. Makes my skin look even and glowing.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!
customer_reviews.text: I use this cream exclusively and daily and can't say enough! I love the lights feeling coverage that still hides blemishes and dark under eye circles. I'm so glad I got it in my Birchbox!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, but the tube pump is awful. Out of 5 purchases of this product, only 1 pump worked properly. I had to pry open the black outer tube casing to get to the inner tube so I could use the product. If I can find another BB cream I like, I'll stop using this product because of the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Hunt

customer_reviews.title: ... or being dissatisfied with the coverage I am very happy with this one
customer_reviews.text: This is a full coverage BB cream and after trying a million and either having some skin reaction or being dissatisfied with the coverage I am very happy with this one. I have sensitive skin and the lack of fragrance or irritating ingredients is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: less product than you think is really in it -shiny finish (which is fixed if you use powder over or) -slightly grey undertone Ov
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -skincare benefits -good SPF -decent coverage but looks natural/"no makeup" look -blends well -sanitary pump applicator Cons: -deceptive packaging... less product than you think is really in it -shiny finish (which is fixed if you use powder over or) -slightly grey undertone Overall a good BB cream. This one is a lot bette than other ones I've tried, because it's actually true to being a real BB cream. Too many are tinted moisturizers disguised as BB cream, while as this one has all of the multifunctional aspects that they are supposed to have. Will continue using, might buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it on my 63 year old skin...smooth and creamy!
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: Contrary to most reviews (so maybe it's just my skin) ...
customer_reviews.text: Contrary to most reviews (so maybe it's just my skin), it seemed very thick, strongly scented, and was not discrete at all.
customer_reviews.author: Schyler

customer_reviews.title: Great BB Cream
customer_reviews.text: Only BB cream I have continued to purchase. Blends in well with my (very) pale skin, but doesn't hide my freckles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. It is very lightweight and gives just the right amount of coverage!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yessssyesyes
customer_reviews.text: I am completely obsessed with this BB Creme! I have oily skin and was constantly breaking out with other makeup, but this is amazing. The color is light. The texture is creamy, but not cakey. Good for a dewy- not oily- finish. Lasts all day. Will buy again. Also paraben free.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Guffin

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! Great coverage and makes my skin look amazing.
customer_reviews.author: R. VanDyke

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I really like this BB cream. It's a tad bit heavy for my preference but it still works well, covers well without being too thick.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Brady

customer_reviews.title: Ew! Chemical sunscreens!
customer_reviews.text: I will NEVER buy this product again! They added chemical sunscreens!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Triana

customer_reviews.title: This makes my skin look awesome. I don't even look like I have makeup ...
customer_reviews.text: This makes my skin look awesome. I don't even look like I have makeup on!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a few BB creams and so far this is my favorite. I have bad skin, rosacea and dry skin, and I actually use this under my airbrush make-up. It makes my skin look so much better and a lot less dry. Edit: I don't use this too much anymore. I love the product but the color of it is just too dark for me. I don't like it when my face does not match my neck. I hate how most BB creams only come in 1 shade. They really need to have at least 4 or 5 shades from very light to very dark.
customer_reviews.author: A. Douthit

customer_reviews.title: There really isn't much to say about a product that ...
customer_reviews.text: There really isn't much to say about a product that does what it promises to do. Light to medium coverage depending on your skin type/color. It works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cresta Jones

customer_reviews.title: Miracle foundation! Will never use a different foundation!
customer_reviews.text: This foundation cleared my problem skin up within a week of using it. It looks like I'm wearing no makeup at all and does wonders for evening out my skin tone. I have tried sooooo many other foundations from drugstore ones to fancy upscale foundations and nothing will compare to Dr. Jart!
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with this! The bottle is hard which is odd. The color blends great. Really good coverage.
customer_reviews.author: M Brown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty on my skin, feels a little dry though.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Used product
customer_reviews.text: Great product but the bottle came more than half empty. The case is a hard shell so it's easy to be fooled. The first time I used it I was already having difficulty getting the product out with the built in pump.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! The best I have found! Fast delivery too!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Buhrmeseter

customer_reviews.title: blends in easy, improves skin
customer_reviews.text: Non greasy, blends in easy, improves skin, looks natural, may look greyish at first but seems to settle
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE this beauty balm
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this beauty balm!! cannot say enough good stuff about it it has been my go to for some time now!
customer_reviews.author: sandy collura

customer_reviews.title: very pink
customer_reviews.text: I thought because I was so pale with rosy cheeks the pink wouldn't be a problem. It was. It also has less coverage than the silver label. At least my skin felt soft and I didn't break out. I suggest a sample first because it's REALLY pink.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Works well and blends in with my summer and winter ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well and blends in with my summer and winter skin - never greasy, never dry...I will buy this as long as it's manufactured, period.
customer_reviews.author: Lili

customer_reviews.title: Very very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a good make up primer and wasnt happy with anything I found. I used this product my mom recommended and love it! Great coverage and still works great under makeup or by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Geurts

customer_reviews.title: The best BB cream!
customer_reviews.text: So many BBs and CCs have a shade that's just not right for me. Dr Jart+ is just perfection! A little gives good, even coverage but is so natural. I love this!
customer_reviews.author: Ann K

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: This is the only make up/skin care product I will spend over $20 on. It does a great job of covering PIH without looking heavy
customer_reviews.author: Caroline F.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product for all skin types. I have used it for years and highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Chalta

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: More like a foundation than BB cream. But loving it so far!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not a lot of coverage but it feels light on the skin and I never broke out!
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and lite
customer_reviews.text: It goes on smooth and lite. The color is just right. The last one I bought was 11 moths ago, so it really lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Lover

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best! I love the coverage and it doesn't feel heavy! My good friend recommended and I could not be happier with this product!
customer_reviews.author: KLF

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product for acne prone skin, covers blemishes and evens out skin tone. Absolutely my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value for money
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product. It blends into my skin perfectly, and does not get crusty where I have dry skin or breakouts like other bb creams or foundations do. Unfortunately the package is just SO small. After using it about 10 times it's almost empty. For $32 I would hope to be able to use this for at least a month.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: the makeup is great but the bottle it comes in is garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Best bb I have tried! Covers well and does not make me break out Have recommended to all my friends who ask me what I am using since my skin looks so good
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Pack

customer_reviews.title: Great for fair, sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this BB cream for years. Any other BB creams I've tried don't compare to this. My skin is very fair. Sometimes, the lightest foundation color is too dark for me. This matches my skin perfectly and provides great, medium coverage. It's also great for sensitive skin and is one of the few products that doesn't aggravate my rosacea.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is honestly the best BB cream I've ever used. It minimized my breakouts and gives complete coverage without being heavy. I apply every day with a moistened beauty blender and the product lasts me close to three months. The smell is decent and I don't feel like my pores are clogged when I take it off in the evenings.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: needs more color options, not everyone has fair, pinkish skin
customer_reviews.text: It's thick and hard to blend in quickly enough. Product does improve how your skin looks, but they need more color options. It's very fair and pink, even for my light to medium Irish complexion. I ended up going with bare minerals complexion rescue (and am not associated with them in any way). They offer lots of colors, and the gel cream is thinner and easier to blend in. It's less flawless perhaps, very sheer, but I love how it feels like I'm wearing nothing on my face. I just use a little concealer if I want to look more flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn C

customer_reviews.title: Too pink!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight yet gives good coverage at the same time. It also gives a great glow! My only problem is that the bb cream is too light/ pink even for me (I'm probably the most fair skinned peachy person out there) so I end up looking really creepy if I use more than a dime sized amount of product. Hoping it will look more natural in the Winter...
customer_reviews.author: Allie Mac

customer_reviews.title: it was good.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely is not meant for pale people unless you have something white to mix into it to make the shade lighter. This is coming from a girl with porcelain skin. Other than the color, it was good.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product and plan to continue using it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I love Dr. Jarts. I have used this one (black label) and the water fuse bb creams. I like them both just thought this one looked beter on my skin. Goes on nice and smooth. Not too heavy but perfect coverage. The container and dipensing of product is clean and easy enough. I would never have been exposed to this without my birchbox. It doesnt break my skin out, easy to get off, great coverage without feeling gunky.
customer_reviews.author: Alex&Bekah

customer_reviews.title: Dr. Jart+ black label detox BB beauty balm
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. Does Dr. Jart+ have the CC also? It goes on smooth and seems to last awhile.
customer_reviews.author: SKL

customer_reviews.title: i love the product and use it regularly
customer_reviews.text: i love the product and use it regularly, but i purchased on 10/26 and still haven't received it! unacceptable in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Mirinda

customer_reviews.title: Daughter
customer_reviews.text: Again, another gift I got for the daughter. I've heard no complaints so far so that's good. As far as the p-roduct goes I haver no personal input
customer_reviews.author: Donald E. Moore

product_meta.title: :Dr. Jart+ Black Label Detox BB Beauty Balm SPF 30
product_meta.description: Perfect and protect skin instantly with this all-in-one multifunctional Beauty Balm. This triple-action formula naturally covers blemishes and uneven skintone, and contains botanical actives to purify and calm blemish-prone or irritated skin. Arbutin works to erase unwanted dark spots, while caviar extract and antioxidants protect skin from inner and outer pollutants for an enhanced radiance. Lightweight with sunscreen protection for simple, one-step neutralizing coverage, this soothing cream delivers optimal results for both women and men. It would have a better result on dry/neutral skin.
feature_bullets: Botanical formula to purify and calm blemish prone or sensitive skin while also combating dark spots and pollutants for an enhanced radiance
